components: ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,ELECTRICAL SYSTEM,EXTERIOR LIGHTING
summary: LIGHT COMES ON, ON DASH CONSUMER HAS TAKEN  VEHICLE TO THE DEALER, AND THEY TOLD HIM THAT IT WAS  NOTHING WRONG WITH  VEHICLE.WHEN HE WAS ON VACATION,RADIATOR HOSE BUSTED. WHEN HE RETURNED HOME , HE WENT TO THE DEALER,  AND WAS REIMBURSED SOME OF HIS MONEY BACK BY THE DEALER. ALSO, WAS TOLD BY  DEALER WHEN  DASH LIGHT INDICATOR THAT SOMETHING WAS WRONG WITH BATTERY.   *AK
